cause.description:
The renaissance period was a large turning point in history. There was a large emphasis on the arts, style, government, and education. Our world wouldn't be where it is today without this period of history.
Renaissance re-enactors strive to re-create this setting for the masses. Through wenches, pirates, bards, lords and ladies we are given a view into the world that came before!
Real men know how to wear a kilt and only a real woman can wear a tight bodice! HUzzah!
1. Men have the right to wear kilts in the traditional manner.
2. Women have the right to have thier chest exposed in a tight bodice.
3. Muskettes and cannons are appropriate field artillary.
4. One Day the members of the SCA and other re-enactors will take over the world.
cause.mission: Encourage and recruit renaissance re-enactors everywhere!!
cause.name: Real Men Wear Kilts & Real Women Wear Bodices
